bibl.title: Letter from William E. Deeks to Henry Rose Carter, October 30, 1924

div1.p: Deeks sends Carter galley proofs of three papers.

div1.head: Letter from William E. Deeks to Henry Rose Carter, October 30, 1924
div1.opener:
Mis
Deeks
0000-2-23
N.Y. 24
UNITED FRUIT COMPANY
GENERAL OFFICES, 131 STATE STREET, BOSTON, MASS.
WILLIAM E. DEEKS, M. D.
GENERAL MANAGER
CABLE ADDRESS
UNIFRUITCO, NEW YORK
FILE NO.____________
MEDICAL DEPARTMENT
17 BATTERY PLACE, NEW YORK
October 30, 1924.
Dr. H. R. Carter,
2121 California Street, N.W.E.
Washington, D.C.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
We are enclosing herewith printer's galley proofs of the
following paper(s) contributed by you at the Conference in Jamaica:-
(a) Discussion of Dr. Agramonte's paper.
(b) Discussion of Dr. Castellani's paper on “Oriental Sore.”
(c) Discussion of Dr. Muhlen's paper. These papers have been carefully reviewed by an editor.

Will you kindly read them carefully, and after you have
made any corrections you consider desirable return them to us at
the earliest possible date. These papers were submitted to you, and
approved by you, at the time of the Conference; and we will there-
fore consider that they are satisfactory in the present form unless
your reply is received before page proofs are prepared, as no change
can be made after the printing has reached that stage.

We hope this arrangement will be agreeable to you, and
that we will receive your reply by return mail.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, W E Deeks
General Manager Returned someday
rec'd Oct 31
